entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle. Fog patches. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of drizzle or rain. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle in the morning. Periods of rain beginning near noon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
